sentences.english: Restaurant light box production must have characteristics, to attract customers.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳燈箱製作肯定要具有特色，要做到吸引顧客。

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們問餐廳年輕的維吾爾員工這樣冤冤相報何時能了。

sentences.english: Sheldon: You know, I think I may have misjudged this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我想我給這家餐廳的評價錯了。

sentences.english: Hemingway enjoyed his lunches at the Course Restaurant, which is still functioning.
sentences.chinese: 海明威喜歡在賽場的餐廳喫飯，這家餐廳仍然在營業。

sentences.english: Hemingway enjoyed his lunches at the Course Restaurant, which is still functioning.
sentences.chinese: 海明威喜歡在賽場的餐廳喫飯，這家餐廳仍然在營業。

sentences.english: This may seem like a classic Japanese-style pub.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個古典的日式餐廳。

sentences.english: I just had a super-duper meal in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛在餐廳吃了一頓超級大餐。

sentences.english: The guests were all in the dining room now, sitting down to their excess of appetizers.
sentences.chinese: 客人們現在都坐在餐廳裏，喫開了他們奢華的開胃菜。

sentences.english: Close public restaurants, lounges and shops.
sentences.chinese: 關閉公共餐廳，酒廊和商店。

sentences.english: There are also some Western-style meal This is one of the few Canadian restaurants in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 這是上海爲數不多的加拿大餐廳之一。

sentences.english: But then this was one of the most remarkable restaurants I have ever eaten in.
sentences.chinese: 但這裏是我曾品嚐過的最出色的餐廳之一。

sentences.english: Is there any dinning car on the train?
sentences.chinese: 請問這列車上有咐餐廳嗎？

sentences.english: Set tables according to service standards.
sentences.chinese: 根據餐廳辦事標準擺臺。

sentences.english: I'm going to that new Cantonese restaurant tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我明天會去那家新開張的粵式餐廳。

sentences.english: And I think Evita would have been pleased with this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲貝隆夫人會已與這家餐廳的高興。

sentences.english: The logo must incorporate both the Chinese characters and the English name of the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 該標誌必須包含兩個漢字和餐廳的英文名稱。
